body: It would have been so good if the boy stabbed the Baldy in the end
@jokke0009 this is from Dosukebe Onei-chan tankoubon and is more old than the recently ntr works from this author (and this tank have a extra chapter oyakodon from natsu-hiro)

Another disappointment from this author. Make more like the tank "Natsu Jiru" atleast that one has effort put into. This story has the same copy paste characters as other ntr. Atleast have some variety. Smh.
Would be really good if it gets translated
Translate all the tankoubon(?) it have good stories
Getting cucked in a dp lol
